message: Hey Bob, I'm offering you my product for $175. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $120 is just too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but I can't go below $140.  What do you think?
I understand you're willing to come down, but $140 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to meet me at $130?
